description: Defines if the processor is allowed to use the controller's data for AI purposes, e.g., for training, inference, or other purposes.
Requires the processor to ensure that any personnel authorized to process personal data are bound by confidentiality obligations.

Specifies how the processor can engage other companies to process personal data, i.e., adding them as a subprocessor, and if consent from the controller is required, or if the controller needs to be notified.
output_format: Consent required | Notice required | None | Other

description: Geographic restrictions on where personal data can be processed or stored.
Processor's obligation to assist the controller in responding to requests from data subjects exercising their rights.
Processor's obligation to notify the controller upon becoming aware of a personal data breach or security incident.
Requires the processor to reasonably cooperate with the controller in the investigation, mitigation, and remediation of any security incident.
Controller's right to audit the processor's compliance with the DPA.
Processor's obligation to provide reasonable assistance to the controller with conducting Data Protection Impact Assessments.
Procedures for returning or deleting personal data at the end of the service agreement.
Clauses addressing compliance with other emerging US state privacy laws.
Explicit clauses addressing compliance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
Clauses addressing liability and/or indemnification specifically related to data protection breaches or failures under the DPA.
output_format: X times annual fees | Capped at X | None
